items.title: Makers of wind turbines, solar modules eye a slice of UK's $20 billion clean energy market
items.description: India and the UK are also going to collaborate on round-the-clock power supply technologies, industrial decarbonisation, and offshore wind supply chains and financing models, senior government officials told Moneycontrol.

items.title: Britannia unlikely to hike prices further unless input costs rise again, says MD and CEO Varun Berry
items.description: Britannia is strengthening its adjacent categories with new product launches across bakery, biscuits, cheese, and beverages. The non-biscuit portfolio saw strong momentum fuelled by expanded distribution channels.

items.description: Balanced growth across verticals; structural tailwinds from government, defence and global mobility

items.title: Britannia Industries: Volume-led growth, margin recovery on the cards
items.description: Normal monsoon, better execution expected to aid growth recovery

items.title: US-China trade truce: Is it a disadvantage for India?
items.description: Even after the tariff rebalancing, the long-term case for China + 1 stays

items.title: Suryoday Small Finance Bank – a stock for investors with high risk appetite
items.description: Growth guidance intact, but core portfolio stress needs to be watched

items.title: Trump talks with Apple’s Cook as iPhone price hikes loom
items.description: Apple hasn’t changed the starting price of its flagship iPhone model since it debuted the iPhone X in 2017 — keeping it at $999.

items.title: Tata Steel’s Q4 earnings take a hit from pricing erosion
items.description: Higher volume sales partly offset headwinds

items.title: Biocon geared up to be major supplier of insulins, GLP-1 weight loss drugs: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw
items.description: "When you look into FY26, I think we will see some very strong growth in all of our businesses," Mazumdar-Shaw said in an interview to Moneycontrol.

items.title: Cipla eyes growth in FY26 driven by new launches, GLP-1 wave despite Revlimid headwinds
items.description: Managing Director & Global CEO Umang Vohra expressed confidence in the company's ability to expand, driven by a multi-pronged strategy across key markets.
